name: Luke Melvilles Web Design
tag_list: design, web, luke, melvilles, melville, perth, wa, country, websites
overview:
Hi, my name is Luke Melville. I’m a young, enthusiastic web designer that has over 5 years of experience in freelance web design. I like keeping up with current website trends and analysing other websites in order to improve my own work. I am always looking to improve my services and the content management system that my customers trust. I am currently studying an undergraduate degree in Business Information Systems and Internet Communication at Curtin University which I hope to finish by 2015. Have a look at my Blog for some interesting topics on exciting things happening on the web! Be sure to check out my article on QR Codes, very exciting marketing tool!

My mission is to provide quality web solutions with a CMS, that is easy to use, to Country WA, Perth and other states. I give you my personal assurance that I can provide you with a great website and fantastic after sale support. If you want to take a look at my previous work, check out my Project Portfolio. My customers always get the best and that is what I want for you. Please contact me and we can talk about your website needs.
